fields.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
If Override Default Unit Price is set, the line Purchase Date and Unit Price overrides the default values from the header.
Purchase Date determines the unit price to use on the line by selecting the Investment Pool Valuation for that date.
If provided, the line Unit Price overrides the unit price selected by the line Purchase Date.

Donor_Contribution_Reference_Donor_Contr.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Donor_Contribution_Reference_WID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

InvestmentPoolPurchase_Investment_Pool_P.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Override_Default_Unit_Price.description: If Override Default Unit Price is set, the line Purchase Date and Unit Price overrides the default values from the header.

Purchase_Date.description: Purchase Date determines the unit price to use on the line by selecting the Investment Pool Valuation for that date.

Unit_Price.description: If provided, the line Unit Price overrides the unit price selected by the line Purchase Date.
